item.title: About the Playbook
item.description: About the Playbook This project belongs to the OWASP Core Business Application Security project. [Important] Make sure you have the appropriate permissions to actively scan and test applications. Without doing so, you might face legal implications

item.title: Supporters and Contributors
item.description: Contributors Markus Rest (@xamafe) (Leader) Julian Petersohn (@randomstring) (Leader) Waseem Ajrab (@default-eshu) Supporters Thank you to all our supporters and sponsors for their help and support to allow us to continue our work on the project.
